Reviews.Title: good stuff for home security
Reviews.Author: Aijun Zhu
Reviews.Content: I love it. It is really good enough for home security. In short, Just love it, So good.I have no idea why I have to type more words. It's just good.............

Reviews.Title: Jose M. Leon
Reviews.Author: Jose M. Leon M.
Reviews.Content: The product is excellent for the low price, it is very comfortable despite its menu to Venezuela buy wine in English language and immediately switch to Spanish, the installation very easy, highly recommend this surveillance kit for those who want something comdo and easy to install

Reviews.Title: customer
Reviews.Author: carlos chapa
Reviews.Content: The system is good  only thing i didnt like that it has no zoom but for the price its good ,customer service was great . Satisfied customer .

Reviews.Title: price reasonable for the entire surveillance.
Reviews.Author: Beverly Hurst
Reviews.Content: I choose this rating because the cost was reasonable, cameras givesa good picture and it is simple to install and run.

Reviews.Title: Great security system
Reviews.Author: cottontop
Reviews.Content: this is one great setup  for a security system,  easy to install and priced reasonable,  thanks Zmoda for your product.

Reviews.Title: just okay
Reviews.Author: jens2free
Reviews.Content: It took us 2days  to set up everything and some of the wires did not work so we had to go to radio shack it was just a hottmess...it was just an ok product..should of got wireless...lol

ProductInfo.Features:
Instand email alert with photo if activity detected
When everyone else is asleep, our cameras are watching closely
24IR LEDs allow for 80ft automatic night vision
The metal housing is designed for indoors & outdoors use
500GB hard drive allows for 24/7 recording over 8 days
ProductInfo.Name: ZMODO 8CH H.264 CCTV Surveillance DVR 8 Outdoor Day Night Waterproof Security Camera System with 500GB HDD
